DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , randomize , double-masked , control study evaluate safety efficacy fluocinolone acetonide ( FA ) intravitreal implant management subject non-infectious uveitis affect posterior segment eye . An additional objective compare safety efficacy two dose fluocinolone acetonide .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Fluocinolone Acetonide Intravitreal Implants
DOC.criteria: Males nonpregnant female least 6 year age diagnose treated recurrent , noninfectious uveitis affect posterior segment one eye least 1 year prior start study , 'quiet ' eye surgery Coexisting medical ocular condition would interfere study result
